item.title: About
item.description: Email: lenzener@gmail.com I’m generally open to freelance work and other requests. (see Skills for a half-resume) I will not make a game for you for free or do your homework. Otherwise, don’t be afraid to ask!

item.title: Chinese Test
item.description: 正文测试 而这些并不是完全重要，更加重要的问题是， 带着这些问题，我们来审视一下学生会退会。 既然如何， 对我个人而言，学生会退会不仅仅是一个重大的

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

Contact Email lenzener@gmail.com I’m generally open to freelance work and other requests. (see Skills for a half-resume) I will not make a application for you for free or do your homework. Otherwise, don’t be afraid to ask!

Preferred Languages C/C++ C# Go Other Known Languages Python Java Lua Bash and Shell Script Experience Please contact me for employment history. 12 years of mostly hobbyist software engineering experience 2 years of freelancing experience with a variety of software engineering and game development projects 6 years of software development for robot technology Full Stack Web Development Embedded Software Development with C for IoT Independent Game Development Technologies This excludes languages listed in the language sections.

item.title: Links
item.description: To use this feature, add links section to frontmatter. This page’s frontmatter: links: - title: GitHub description: GitHub is the world's largest software development platform. website: https://github.com image: https://github.githubassets.com/images/modules/logos_page/GitHub-Mark.png - title: TypeScript description: TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript that compiles to plain JavaScript. website: https://www.typescriptlang.org image: ts-logo-128.jpg image field accepts both local and external images.
